content.title: EMC Corporation
content.subtitle: Academic Alliance Center
points: Faculty members were trained at EMC Corporation and equipped to train students on Information Storage Management.
654 students were trained on Information Storage Management.
KCE was selected and awarded by EMC Corporation for being one among the TOP 5 academic alliance colleges in Tamil Nadu.

content.title: Infosys Campus Connect
content.subtitle: Industry Partnership Program
points: Advanced Partner College status and rated among TOP 3 performers under Infosys, Chennai.
2000+ students have been trained in 9 technical modules of Infosys so far.
During the last 3 years, 222 students had undergone internship at Infosys.

content.title: Oracle Workforce Development Center
content.subtitle: Enterprise Skill Program
points: Faculty members were trained by Oracle Corporation and students were trained at the institution on Oracle Technology Products.
119 students were trained in Oracle 9i: Introduction to SQL.
114 students were trained in Oracle 9i: DBAI.
96 students were trained in Oracle 10g: Introduction to SQL.

content.title: National Instruments LabView Academy
content.subtitle: National Instruments LabView Academy for Virtual Instrumentation
points: Recognized as Training Center for Professional Certification from National Instruments, USA.
About 250+ students have undergone training so far.

content.title: B&R Center of excellence
points: Provides Training in Industrial Automation in collaboration with B&R Automation.

header.title: KISDC â€“ Igniting Ideas into Impact
header.description: Empowering creativity, innovation, and entrepreneurial excellence by bridging research, industry, and commercialization.

highlights.title: Innovation Ecosystem
highlights.text: Fostering creativity through seminars, innovation programs, and product-oriented research & development.

highlights.title: From R&D to Market
highlights.text: Bridging the gap between research and commercialization by accelerating indigenous product development.

highlights.title: Startup & IPR Support
highlights.text: Facilitating entrepreneurial training, IPR guidance, and encouraging faculty & student startup initiatives.

highlights.title: Industry Alignment
highlights.text: Ensuring strong interaction between academia and industry to align education with real market demands.

highlights.title: Skill & Entrepreneurship Programs
highlights.text: Conducting EAC, EDP, FDP, and Skill Development Programs to nurture future-ready professionals.

highlights.title: Mentorship & Innovation Projects
highlights.text: Mentoring student entrepreneurs and initiating innovative projects for product development every year.
